root.name: WWF Raw
root.description: OverviewWWF Raw is a wrestling game developed by Sculptured Software and published by Acclaim for multiple platforms.Featured WrestlersSNES, Genesis 32X Versions 1-2-3 Kid Bam Bam Bigelow Bret Hart DieselDoink the ClownKwang (only 32X Version with a code) Lex LugerLuna Vachon Owen Hart Razor Ramon Shawn Michaels The Undertaker YokozunaGame Gear Version Bam Bam Bigelow Bret HartCrush Diesel Lex Luger Randy Savage Razor Ramon Shawn Michaels The Undertaker YokozunaGame Boy Version Bret Hart DieselDoink the Clown Lex Luger Razor Ramon Shawn Michaels The Undertaker Yokozuna
